maxResults.description: The maximum number of slot types to return in the response. The default is 10.

nameContains.description: Substring to match in slot type names. A slot type will be returned if any part of its name matches the substring. For example, 'xyz' matches both 'xyzabc' and 'abcxyz.'

nextToken.description: A pagination token that fetches the next page of slot types. If the response to this API call is truncated, Amazon Lex returns a pagination token in the response. To fetch next page of slot types, specify the pagination token in the next request.
